data.title: The Best Place to Visit in Dubai, UAE
data.meta_description: Dubai Miracle Garden is the world's largest natural flower garden, home to 150 million flowers of different varieties and is among the top tourist attractions in Dubai
data.text:
Emirates A380: With its unique, larger-than-life double-decker design, the Airbus A380 is one of the most loved super jumbo jets in the world – and no airline has more of them than Emirates, Dubai’s flagship carrier.

Smurfs Village: Now in its majestic tenth year, the world’s largest natural flower garden unveils a new attraction that kids and kids-at-heart will surely adore. Dubai Miracle Garden is proud to announce the launch...

Floral Clock: Time is a funny thing – we love to worry about it, and often feel like there’s never enough. While we usually look at our phone or wrist to check it, sometimes it’s nice to see it from a different vantage point.

Umbrella Tunnel: We’ve got more than one cool, colourful passage at Dubai Miracle Garden. Our Umbrella Passages are one of the most interesting, creatively designed spaces at the garden....

Lake Park: Water and flowers are a wonderful combination, and you can see it come to life at our Lake Park. The scene created by the reflection of floral villas and 3D flower-laden models against the blue sky ....

Hill Top: The vibrant flowers lend a sense of verticality to Dubai Miracle Garden. Visitors navigate a wonderful passage that takes them to a lower part of the garden. From this vantage point,...

3D Floral Design: The colors, designs and structure of our 3D floral characters are a testament to our team’s craft for the visitors of the region’s most popular flower garden. We reinvigorated the concept ...

Sunflower Field: As their name suggests, sunflowers love the sun. In fact, they need it so badly that they actually turn to face it when they’re young. It’s only fitting, then, that sunflowers look their finest on bright...
